If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg:
Hello! I see you're at the top-right corner of the map. Are you ready to embark on an exciting adventure? I'll be your guide to help you navigate through this mysterious terrain. Let's begin!

First, take a few steps to the left. You'll notice a small island with a leopard resting on it. Make sure to pass just below the leopard. Can you see the island and the leopard?

Great! Now, continue to move forward until you come across a wooden twig. Walk across the twig to reach a larger island. On this island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant.

Go over the head of the parrot and then head down (south) between the parrot and the elephant. Can you see them?

Excellent! Now, let's continue our journey. Leave this island, heading in a south-eastern direction. You'll encounter three rocks, two gray ones and a darker one. Cross over them one by one, making sure to step on each rock. Can you see the rocks?

Perfect! Now, from the rocks, keep going in the same direction until you reach a new island with a frog on it. Walk just below (south of) the frog and then take a u-turn to the left (west). Can you spot the frog and make the turn?

Great job! Now, it's time to make our way back. Cross over the back of a crocodile, heading back to the island with the parrot and the elephant. This time, go left (west) to reach that island. Can you see the crocodile and make your way back to the island?

Fantastic! Now, on the island with the parrot and the elephant, head straight and cross over two gray rocks. These rocks will lead you to an island with a giraffe on it. Go below (south-west) the giraffe, then make a 90 degree turn to the left (south-east). Can you see the giraffe and make the turn?

Wonderful! We're almost there. From the giraffe, continue in the same direction until you reach another island. On this island, you'll find a snake. Walk over the snake to reach our final destination, the treasure. Can you see the snake and make your way over it?

Congratulations! You've done an amazing job following the path! You have successfully reached the treasure! Well done, adventurer!

I hope you enjoyed this journey and had fun navigating through the map. If you have any more questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, please let me know. Happy exploring!

chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to start the adventure?

Great! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. Let's begin our journey. 

First, I want you to take a few steps to your left (west). Can you please do that?
Fantastic! You're doing great. Now, as you continue west, you will come across a wooden bench. Please pass by it and keep going straight ahead.

Fantastic! Now, as you keep going straight, you'll come to a stream. Please cross the stream and head towards the florist stand. But hold on! Don't reach the stand just yet. Instead, take a U-turn to your left (east) and cross the stream again, retracing your steps. Let me know once you've done that.

Excellent! Now that you've crossed the stream again, you should find yourself back near the white dog. Just next to the dog, there is a wooden branch crossing a river. Please carefully cross over the branch and continue southwards (down the map). Let me know when you're south of the branch.

Great job! Now that you're south of the wooden branch, keep heading straight south. As you go, you'll come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Pass over the picnic mat, being careful not to disturb anything, and continue going to the west. Let me know once you've reached the westward path.

Terrific! Now, as you continue west, you'll come across another wooden branch crossing the river. This time, please cross the branch to the north side of the river. Let me know when you have successfully crossed the branch.

Wonderful! Now that you've crossed the wooden branch to the north side of the river, you'll see a green bush just ahead. Instead of going straight towards the bush, we're going to take a little detour. Circle around the bush from the right side. Keep going until you reach the florist stand. Let me know once you've made it to the stand.

Great job! Now that you've reached the florist stand, turn left (west) and go below the stand. As you continue west, you'll come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass to the west side of the bridge. Let me know once you've crossed the bridge.

Brilliant! Now that you've crossed the bridge, just a bit past it, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Take a few steps south, passing between the old people and another wooden branch. Let me know when you've reached the green bush next to the end of the wooden branch.
Wonderful progress! Now, from the green bush, I want you to head east, going between the wooden branch and the bush. Take a few steps in that direction. Let me know when you're ready.

Excellent! You're doing great. Now, just a few steps to the east, you'll spot a brown young deer. Congratulations, you've reached your final destination! Well done on following the path accurately. I hope you enjoyed the journey. Thank you for playing our map navigation game!

chat.msg: Great! Let's get started. You are currently at the opening of a tent at the top of the map. Take a few steps south of the tent and you should see a trail. Follow that trail to the east until you reach a small bonfire. Let me know when you're there.
No worries! Take your time. Just remember to head south of the tent and follow the trail east until you see the bonfire. Let me know once you've reached it!

Awesome! You've reached the bonfire. Now, leave the trail and go to the left (north) of the fire. Continue heading east, but make sure to stay north of the trail. Let me know when you're past the fire and heading east on the trail again.

Great job! Now that you're past the fire, continue heading east on the trail. You'll pass under two red mushrooms along the way. Keep going until you reach a blue car. Once you get there, don't touch the car. Instead, make a right u-turn and start heading back west. Let me know when you've made the u-turn!

Fantastic! You've made the right u-turn. Now, start heading back west on the trail. Keep going until you reach a fork in the road. At the fork, take the left (south) branch. As you continue south, you'll pass east of a telescope. After that, veer right and take an off-trail shortcut around the telescope. Let me know when you're back on the trail after the shortcut!

Great work! You're back on the trail after the shortcut. Now, continue heading west on the trail. Eventually, you'll come across a low wall of rocks that surrounds a wooden cabin. Your final destination! Go ahead and cross the wall of rocks to reach the cabin. Congratulations on following the path! Let me know when you've arrived at the cabin.
